/* @jsx mdx */ import React from 'react' import { mdx } from '@mdx-js/react' /* @jsx mdx */ import { Playground, Props } from 'docz' import styled from 'styled-components' import Textarea from '../Textarea/Textarea' import Container from '../Container/Container' import { ThemeProvider } from '../ThemeContext' const makeShortcode = name => function MDXDefaultShortcode(props) { console.warn("Component " + name + " was not imported, exported, or provided by MDXProvider as global scope") return
}; const layoutProps = { }; const MDXLayout = "wrapper" export default function MDXContent({ components, ...props }) { return
